);

END da_account_interaction_role;

body.name: DA_ACCOUNT_INTERACTION_ROLE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_INTERACTION_ROLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.36.621049000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,account_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_interaction_role.add(fx), parms=' || account_id || '|' || account_role_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_interaction_role a
(
a.account_interaction_role_id
,a.account_id
,a.account_role_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_account_interaction_role_id.NEXTVAL
,add.account_id
,add.account_role_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.account_interaction_role_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_interaction_role.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,account_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_interaction_role.add, parms=' || account_id || '|' || account_role_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_interaction_role a
(
a.account_interaction_role_id
,a.account_id
,a.account_role_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_account_interaction_role_id.NEXTVAL
,add.account_id
,add.account_role_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_interaction_role.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_interaction_role_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,account_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_interaction_role.add, parms=' || account_interaction_role_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || account_role_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_interaction_role a
(
a.account_interaction_role_id
,a.account_id
,a.account_role_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_interaction_role_id
,add.account_id
,add.account_role_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_interaction_role.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_interaction_role_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_interaction_role.del, parms=' || account_interaction_role_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_account_interaction_role a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.account_interaction_role_id = del.account_interaction_role_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_interaction_role.del');

END del;

END da_account_interaction_role;
